abstract: Number of start-ups are touting their ability to harness nuclear fusion as unlimited source of power, achievement that has long eluded government scientists and academic researchers; funds from venture capitalists still lag far behind government research money, and some fusion scientists, denied opportunity to evaluate unpublished scientific studies being used by start-ups, doubt companies' chances.
lead_paragraph: Venture capital is flowing to a group of start-ups that are pursuing the long-sought goal of making fusion power a reality.

headline.main: Start-Ups Take On Challenge of Nuclear Fusion
headline.print_headline: Start-Ups Take On Challenge of Fusion

snippet: Venture capital is flowing to a group of start-ups that are pursuing the long-sought goal of making fusion power a reality.
